mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Coulter, Thomas B.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Apola, Armstrong Co., PA [Apola, Armstrong County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Coulter, Thomas B. Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left leg. Wound had healed and returned to duty and reopened. Location Wounded: Antietam, MD. Date Wounded: 1862/09/17. Nature of Wound: Musket ball.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Coulter, Thomas B.
